mapper.select:
SELECT l.lsn_no, l.lsn_title, l.loc_no, l.lsn_lv, l.lsn_days, l.lsn_intro, l.lsn_price, l.lsn_per_time, l.lsn_cnt_sum, l.lsn_star_ppl_cnt, l.user_id, TRUNC((l.lsn_star_sum/l.lsn_star_ppl_cnt), 2) lsnStarScore, TRUNC((SELECT SUM(lsn_star_sum/lsn_star_ppl_cnt)/COUNT(lsn_no) FROM lesson WHERE user_id= l.user_id), 2) proStarScore, u.user_name, p.pro_career, ll.lsn_line_no ,
(SELECT ui.user_nickname FROM lesson_review lr2 LEFT JOIN lesson_line ll ON (lr2.lsn_line_no = ll.lsn_line_no) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ll.user_id = ui.user_id) WHERE lr2.lsn_line_no = lr.lsn_line_no) lsnNickname, lr.review, lr.review_dt, lr.review_edit_dt FROM lesson l JOIN user_info u ON (l.user_id = u.user_id) JOIN pro_info p ON (u.user_id = p.user_id) LEFT JOIN lesson_line ll ON (l.lsn_no = ll.lsn_no) LEFT JOIN lesson_review lr ON (ll.lsn_line_no = lr.lsn_line_no) WHERE l.lsn_no=#{lsnNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lesson (lsn_no, user_id, loc_no, lsn_title, lsn_lv, lsn_days, lsn_intro, lsn_price, lsn_per_time, lsn_cnt_sum, lsn_status, lsn_req_dt) VALUES (lsn_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userInfo.userId}, #{locNo}, #{lsnTitle}, #{lsnLv}, #{lsnDays}, #{lsnIntro}, #{lsnPrice}, #{lsnPerTime}, #{lsnCntSum}, 2, SYSDATE)
